thread.title: Max & Erma's Continues to Serve Up Support for Local Boys & Girls Clubs
thread.title_full: Max & Erma's Continues to Serve Up Support for Local Boys & Girls Clubs - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Max & Erma's Continues to Serve Up Support for Local Boys & Girls Clubs
text:
Max & Erma's
COLUMBUS, Ohio , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Through the hard work of team members and the generosity of its guests, Max & Erma's Restaurants are able to donate a total of $69,273 to local Boys & Girls Clubs in Indiana ( Indianapolis ), Michigan ( Detroit and Lansing ), Ohio ( Akron , Canton , Cleveland , Cincinnati , Columbus , Dayton and Toledo ) and Pennsylvania ( Pittsburgh and Erie ).
During a month-long campaign, Max & Erma's donated $1 from the sale of every Special Boys & Girls Clubs' menu item: The Clubhouse Burger, Buffalo Chicken Dip and Chocolate Cake a La Mode, to local Boys & Girls Clubs. Guests also had the opportunity to add donations directly to their checks to support local clubs.
"We are so grateful to Max & Erma's for its generous commitment to the local Boys & Girls Clubs community and for being such a strong partner," said Rebecca Asmo , CEO for the Boys & Girls Clubs of Columbus . "Partnerships like this enable us to continue to offer a positive environment with enriching activities and programs to kids in our community."
"Max & Erma's is proud that our tradition of supporting our local communities continues to grow as it is embedded in our culture and part of our overall success. The Boys & Girls Clubs is a great example of an ongoing strong local relationship and we are grateful for our generous guests and partners who enabled us to more than double our donation goal this year," said Andy Swingley , Vice President of Operations for Max & Erma's.
About Max & Erma's:
Celebrating its 43-year heritage of award-winning fresh, never frozen burgers; handcrafted salads; signature soups; hand-breaded chicken tenders and fish, Max & Erma's is a popular gathering place for all ages. Max & Erma's is proud to offer ongoing promotions such as Kids Eat Free on Tuesday and Free Cookies Wednesday. Max & Erma's has 64 family friendly locations in 10 states and is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio .
More information is available at http://maxandermas.com/, Max & Erma's Facebook page , and @MaxErmas on Twitter.
Contact: James Blystone , Max & Erma's
